text: PULL BACK from a neon red cross ablaze in the cold Decemb night to REVEAL an inner-city, store-front clinic.  Trash leaves blow over wet, snowy pavement. ANGLE ON a PALE FIGURE standing across the street.  He lo feverish and strung-out, in serious need of a fix.  This JARED NOMAK, 20s.  He starts towards the clinic.

Potential DONORS sit in a waiting area, filling out forms leafing through informational material.  A sign in the wi reads: "Se habla Espanol".  Others read: "YOU ARE MAKING DIFFERENCE", "GIVE LIFE", and "BECOME A PLATELET DONOR". overhear a bored-looking EMPLOYEE behind the information quizzing someone over the phone:
Have you recently visited a tropical country?  Uh-huh?  In the past twelve months have you gotten a tattoo, non sterile acupuncture, or undergone any ear, skin or body piercing?
We MOVE PAST the employee to Nomak, waiting.
Jared Nomak?

Nomak looks up.  We get a better look at his face now - h has a thin scar running from his lower lip down his chin. childhood accident, perhaps.  A NURSE smiles and motions him to join her.  She's carrying a clipboard.
Hi.  We're ready for you now.

Nomak follows the Nurse into a dimly-lit hallway.  We tra their progress in a convex safety mirror suspended from t hallway ceiling as they pass all manner of medical suppli centrifuges, an apheresis device, etc.
(referring to her clipboard) I see from your questionnaire that you don't have any immediate next of kin?
Not that I'm in contact with.
Nobody to call in case of an emergency?
No -- (apprehensive) Does that mean I can't be a donor?
It depends.  We came up with some unusual results on your blood test.

Nomak follows the Nurse to a steel door were TWO SECURITY GUARDS await them.  Both look bored, paying little attent to the monitor which offers a view of the examining room beyond.  There is also a small window with safety glass. GUARD #1 opens the door, following Nomak and the Nurse inside.  GUARD #2 remains behind, manning the hallway.
The Nurse ushers Nomak into the room, indicating he shoul sit in a kind of reclining dental chair with arm and headrests.  Nomak notices a security camera mounted above
(anxious) How unusual?
Beat.  The Nurse sets aside Nomak's file, looking uncomfortable.
Your blood has a very rare phenotype, one that's quite valuable to people like us.
Us?  What are you talking about?
A kind-faced DOCTOR enters, nodding to Guard #1.
It's a good news-bad news scenario, Jared.  Good news for us, bad for you.

The Doctor and Nurse smile, BARING FANGS.  We realize now that they are both vampires.  The Guard, too.  He grips N by the throat, forcing him back into the restraint chair. the vampire Guard does so, his hand brushes against Nomak jaw.  The flesh on Nomak's chin briefly separates along t scar - almost as if it were a seam. The guard pauses - and Nomak LAUGHS.  Definitely NOT the reaction the vampires were expecting from a potential vic Nomak starts to shake and twitch, like he's going into so kind of seizure.  The whites of his eyes bleed red.  He throws his head back, opening his mouth as a PAIR OF RAZO SHARP CANINES extrude from his gums.  These are longer, m more lethal-looking than the fangs of the vampires and -- Nomak lashes out, knocking the Guard backwards.  The Nurs SCREAMS.  Nomak clamps his mouth onto her throat, SLAMMIN her back against the wall. The vampire Doctor rushes to the door, scrambling to unbo it.  Nomak reaches for him, HOWLING with blood-drunk laug as he lifts the Doctor up.  Nomak flings the Doctor about like a toy, using his body to SMASH the lights, then the security camera above.

We hear SCREAMS and HORRIBLE NOISES coming from the exami room.  Guard #2 draws a gun and looks to the security mon with alarm.  The screen goes black.  He looks to the smal window, trying to peer into the now-darkened room beyond SPLASH!  A wave of blood smears across a window.  A HAND wipes a patch of blood away, revealing Nomak's baleful, distorted eyes.  Guard #2 starts to back away when -- BANG!  Nomak slams against the other side of the steel do BANG!BANG!BANG!  The door begins to bend, hand-shaped impressions bulging outward as Nomak starts to peel the d apart like it was an aluminum can. Guard #2 has seen enough.  He turns and runs even as the CAVES INWARD off its hinges.  Forward momentum sends the sliding across the hallway floor where it trips up the Gu
as Nomak steps into the hallway.  Because of the lights above, there are alternating pools of light and shadow in hall.  Nomak advances towards us, his face coming in and of darkness.
Vampires --
With each pool of light, his awful smile seems to distort further and further, until his mouth seems to be widening the way back to his ears.
I fucking hate vampires.
On the floor, the vampire Guard CRIES OUT in fear, helple raising his hands to defend himself.  Nomak HOWLS and lea towards him/us, blacking out the screen with his hurtling form as we --

BOOM!  A second-story door flies open and FIVE VAMPIRE th wannabes come spilling out.  They race down a flight of stairs, tripping and tumbling over themselves.  In descen order, they are: RUSH, a pimped-out Vanilla Ice clone wea Karl Kani gear, followed by JIGSAW, ST. CLOUD, T-BAG and SEGURA.

exits just behind them, eschewing the stairs completely a vaulting over the railing.  He unholsters his MACH pistol he drops, FIRING it as he lands in a cat-like stance on t snowy ground below -- BA-BANG!  A silver-tipped bullet punches through T-Bag's chest.  He turns to ash even as his fellow vamps dash thr the disintegrating cloud that used to be his body.  The embers melt the snow where they land. A super-charged foot chase ensues, with hunter and prey moving at speeds in excess of anything a human would ever capable of.  We're talking thirty-five, even forty miles hour.

Running like a bull, condensed vapor streaming from his m and nostrils.  Splashing through puddles of icy water storming through barriers of plywood and razor wire, leap over mountains of garbage bags.
as they flatten a length of cyclone fencing like it was c paper.  They scramble up an obstacle of waste bins, leapi into the air --
pulling out his twin-bladed boomerang as he runs.  He fli the weapon.  It twirls around, catching --
and cutting the vampire completely in half.  As the disintegrating halves of St. Cloud fall to the side, Blad storms over the waste bin.

The remaining vampires stumble into a narrower alley wher GROUP OF BUMS are warming themselves over a series of oil drum fires. Jigsaw slips, TRIPPING over one of the burning oil drums, catching himself ablaze.  He doesn't give a shit.  He kee on running, barreling his way into --

-- the back entrance of a cramped, sweat-shop.  Some kind noodle factory filled with steam and equipment and YAMMER FOREIGNERS and -- -- here comes Blade, hot on the vampires' heels, shoulder workers aside and --

-- Rush and the remaining vamps spill out onto the street where a number of motorcycles are waiting for them -- two R1200 motorbikes and a tricked-out Panhead Harley chopper with ape-hanger handlebars. Rush and Segura leap atop their BMWs.  Jigsaw rolls into puddle of water, dousing himself, then jumps onto his chopper.  As the vamps peel out --

Bursts from the factory.  Segura revs his BMW, trying to him down.  At the last second, Blade pivots aside like a matador.  Segura circles around for another try. Blade leaps, somersaulting through the air, then lands on back of the bike behind Segura.  SHINGGG!  Blade pulls a retractable garrotte wire from the sleeve of his jacket a wraps it around Segura's throat. With a violent twist, Blade decapitates Segura.  As the vampire's headless body turns to ash before him, Blade le forward and takes the controls of the speeding motorcycle WHOOSH!  Blade speeds after the other vamps.
Rush and Jigsaw gun their bikes for all they're worth.  U ahead, a line of construction barricades are blocking the way.  The vampires power on through the barricades, then abruptly brake --

before them is under construction.  There's a twenty-foot in the road where a portion is missing, pieces of re-bar poking out from the ends of the prefabricated sections. Rush and Jigsaw consider their options, but then they hea the ROAR of Blade's engine as he comes SCREAMING over the rise in the road! Fuck it.  Rush powers his chopper forward, making the jum burning rubber as he lands on the far side.  Jigsaw torqu his handle and follows, rocketing towards the gap.

as he snaps his hand up -- a trio of Japanese throwing st appearing between his fingers like a magician's cards.  H flings the stars at Jigsaw's bike -- The throwing stars hit Jigsaw's back tire and the bike go down, vomiting SPARKS as it slides forward.  Jigsaw is fl forward like a ragdoll, out over the gap in the overpass -- WHUNK!  Jigsaw is impaled on the protruding re-bar!  H HOWLS, instantly disintegrating as Blade makes the jump!
Rush cuts onto an on-ramp, powering his way onto the free
Hyper-speed.  Rush slouches low, trying to cut wind resistance and will his bike faster.  He hazards a look b

is gaining on him like demon of speed. Rush pulls a TEC-9, FIRING back at Blade.  It's no good. Blade is nearly upon him, unsheathing his sword from his scabbard -- Blade JABS his sword forward into Rush's rear-wheel.  The bike locks up, flips over, BURSTS INTO FLAMES.  The whole screaming wreck slews forward, SHOWERING SPARKS --

goes flying onto the road, rolling over and over, one of legs SNAPPING at a bone-breaking angle.  As he lies there MOANING, Blade circles around, sweeping past Rush's decim bike, retrieving his sward from the burning wreckage. Blade kills the engine on his own bike and dismounts.  Ru is pathetically trying to drag his broken body to safety. Blade approaches, placing his boot heel on the back of Ru neck, forcing his face against the asphalt.  He unholster his MACH, pointing it at the vampire's bleeding head. Blade's opening line:
Tell me where he his now and I'll consider you a loose end.

CLOSE ON a peeling wall mural -- smiling 30s cartoon cow winking at us, licking her chops.  The logo reads: "TASTY Blade's matte-black Charger RUMBLES into view and parks i front of the abandoned milk factory.  Blade steps out, heaving an equipment sack onto his shoulder.

THREE LACONIC VAMPIRE TOUGHS are playing poker at a card table, dealing out novelty nudie cards.  We hear a NOISE. One of the vampires approaches a reinforced door.  He sli open a viewing slot and peers through.  Nobody outside. vampire turns back to his poker buddies, shrugging --
Nobody's th--

Before the vampire can even finish his sentence, Blade's SWORD punches straight through the door into his chest. gasps and turns to ash as the sword disengages back out through the door and -- CRASH!  The door explodes open, sending clouds of burning vampire embers every which way.  In walks Blade, grinning wickedly, MACH ready -- As the other two vampires rise - POW!  A silver hollow-po hits the first one in the neck.  POW!  Another hollow-poi takes out the second.  The vampires drop, turning to ash. Blade holsters his MACH, striding through vampire ash pil The place is eerily quiet here, in stark contrast to the mayhem of the last few minutes.  Just the steady, low-pit HUM of machinery. Blade starts forward.  Up ahead, a FAINT GLOW is emitting from behind an area that's been sectioned off with canvas tarps.  Blade sweeps one of the tarps aside --

are hidden inside.  The first two are empty.  A MAN is suspended within the third, bobbing weightlessly in a sea red plasma.  His long, gray hair floats about his face, shrouding his weathered features.  We're not sure if he's sleeping or dead.
Old man, old man, what've they done to you --

Whistler's ace drifts around into view.  Blade shakes his head in sadness.  He looks about for a way to extract Whistler, doesn't see any obvious means, then -- CRASH!  Blade kicks through the glass.  Blood and fluids flood out around him as Whistler's limp body tumbles part down, but he's still suspended by the wires and medical leads.  Blade unsheathes his sword, severing the wires -- Whistler falls into his arms.  Blade cradles him, then -- gunsmith's eyes abruptly snap open, flooding with rage. Blade staggers back as the HOWLING horror that used to be mentor wraps his hands around Blade's throat, forcing him the ground.  Whistler ROARS, revealing a set of jagged fa
Why didn't you finish me off?!?!  I told you --
Whistler SLAMS the back of Blade's head against the concr floor again and again, punctuating his words with each SL
-- TO -- FUCKING -- FINISH -- ME -- OFF!

Blade knees Whistler in the balls.  Whistler lets go, cup his groin as Blade heaves him aside. Blade strips off his gauntlets.  Whistler springs at him again.  Blade sinks his fist deep in Whistler's stomach. Whistler doubles over, Blade twists Whistler's hands behi his back, cuffing his wrists together with a pair of tita manacles. Blade pulls a restraint hood from his equipment bag and quickly slips it over Whistler's head, cinching it tight. Another beat.  Whistler doesn't stir.  He's down for the count.  Blade pauses a moment, catching his breath as he leans on Whistler's still form.  He's exhausted.
Come on, Whistler.
He rises, heaving Whistler's body over his shoulder.
Let's go home.

Blade's battered Charger knifes through the snow-dusted u blight like a shadow.  Boarded up businesses, tent cities doorways bombed with graffiti throwups -- wherever this godforsaken Gomorrah is, it's definitely a notch down on misery scale from the city Blade used to call home. Up ahead, the sprawl levels out, giving way to an ice-bou harbor wreathed in fog.
Blade drives on, inured to the sqaulor.  He made peace wi the darkness a long time ago.

The Charger weaves its way through a maze of scrap metal rusty shipping containers, homing in on a sprawling wareh that's been cordoned off by cyclone fencing and razor wir Utlra-violent floodlights illuminate the area, while secu cameras keep a watchful eye.

More UV lights flicker on.  We're in a massive loading elevator/platform which HUMS as it ascends, eventually reaching its destination with a BOOMING CLANG.  The doors the rear glide open.  Blade guides the Charger out.

Santa's workshop by way of Soldier of Fortune.  Industria equipment is strewn everywhere.  Mills, old furnaces, gut vehicles, an ad hoc surgical theater.  We also notice the rig which Scud had been piloting.  Because of various lea overhead pipes, the floor is slick with a sheen of water. Blade kills his Charger, looking around as he climbs out.
Scud!
Blade's voice ECHOES throughout the cavernous room.
Lock up your daughters, people --
A handlebar moustached, weed-sucking stoner.  Thrift-stor chic, wearing a Jimmy Walker "Dyn-O-Mite!" T-shirt.
The Dark Knight returns.

Scud is lowering himself down from the ceiling on a rope pulley system where he'd been suspended in a safety harne doing some kind of electrical wiring job.  He reaches the floor and unclips himself.  We notice he's wearing a surf charm around his neck that's been strung with vampire fan Scud pulls a half-smoked roach from behind his ear, using lighter in the shape of a woman's torso to fire up.  The flame jets from a hole in one of her tits.  He takes a Spicoli-sized hit and offers the roach to Blade.
Little toke of the smokage, B?
Blade slaps it from his hand.
Knock it off.  We've got work to do.
Blade opens the trunk.  Scud joins him.
is inside.  Blade unfastens the hood, slipping it off. Immediately, Whistler sits up, LUNGING at Blade!
Fuck me!
Blade gets Whistler in a headlock, choking him as he drag him out of the trunk.  It's like trying to wrestle a rabi pit bull.  He looks to Scud, annoyed.
You going to stand there crapping your pants or are you going to help me?!
Scud steps forward, tentative.  Together, he and Blade dr Whistler kicking and SCREAMING across the workshop, forci him into a small, cell-like room.

WHAP!  Blade throws Whistler onto the concrete floor, pin him as Scud quickly slips a series of chains around him w have been secured to the wall.  The opposite wall is cove by a series of steel shutters.  As Whistler continues to thrash, Blade affixes a muzzle to the older man's mouth.
You got something in mind, Blade?
Ultra-rapid detox.  They use it on heroin addicts, make 'em go cold-turkey in one night.
Blade pulls out a pneumatic syringe, plunging an ampoule amber-colored fluid into the bottle mount.
Gonna try and OD Whistler on a retroviral cure.
I don't know about this, man --
Blade injects Whistler with the syringe.  Whistler HOWLS pain, nearly throwing Blade and Scud off him.
(to Scud) Get back!!!

Scud scurries away.  Whistler's struggles have taken an e more violent turn.  Blade beats him back down. Finally, Blade steps on Whistler's neck, pinning his head he draws a shotgun from a holster beneath his armpit.  He shoves it in Whistler's SNARLING FACE.
If there's anything of you left in there, Whistler, listen up now.  Come morning, those shutters are going up. Either you'll be cured, or you'll fry.
Blade raises his foot from Whistler's neck, quickly backi out the door.  Whistler THROWS himself at Blade, nearly tearing the chains from the wall as --

BOOM!  Blade slams the cell door closed.  The door is hea steel.  Nevertheless, Whistler kicks against it, threaten to tear it off its hinges.  Blade throws a heavy cross-ba over the door.  Then he steps back, joining Scud. WHUMP!WHUMP!WHUMP!  Whistler hammers the door again and a and again.  But the crossbar holds.  Blade glances at Scu who's looking winded and shaken by the ordeal.
It's going to be a long night.
Scud nods and exits.  Blade drags a chair across the floo setting it in front of the door.  He sits down, shotgun resting across his knees, holding vigil.  And off that gr stoic image we --

Daylight bleaches the image, almost whiting it out.  A WI sifts through refuse, collecting bottles.  Three MUTTS ar tethered to his side with rope.  He reaches for a bottle, cuts himself on a piece of glass.  As he inspects his wou his dogs GROWL.  The Wino looks up -- A BLACK KID (14) is standing atop a mountain of refuse -- wiry and intense, perched there like a predator.  The Win glances at his wrist again, the blood, then back up at th black kid.  Unnerved, the Wino starts to back away, then turns -- BUMPING right into the black kid, who has moved beside him with uncanny speed.  (NOTE: this all happens within a single, continuous shot.) The boy SLAMS the Wino against the trestle wall and SNARL baring FANGS.  And just as he's about to tear the man's throat out -- A HAND reaches in from off-screen, pulling the boy back. It's WHISTLER, twenty years younger and spryer, with a he full of RAVEN BLACK hair. Whistler throws the boy into the light, forcing him onto ground.  He shoves a .45 against the boy's face and is ju about to pull the trigger when he stops, NOTICING overhea sun reflected in the boy's eyes.  Whistler looks up and S the sun at high noon, then glances back at the boy in understanding.  He smiles.
Daylight.  Son of a bitch.

Blade wakes up, lifts his head.  A shaft of sunlight shin directly down onto him, reflecting back at us from his no adult eyes.  Blade hasn't moved.  He sits in the chair in front of the cell door which is now silent.  He stands, unlocking the cell door.  He heaves the cross-bar away. door GROANS as he opens it.

Blade enters.  It's dark.  We can just make out Whistler' figure huddled in the corner like some kind of caged anim his lanky, gray hair obscuring his face. Whistler doesn't stir.  Blade crosses over to the steel shutters.  For the briefest moments, he hesitates.  Then hits the switch, readying his shotgun.  With a HUM, the shutters rise, throwing a SHAFT OF BLINDING SUNLIGHT over Whistler. Nothing happens.  Blade lowers his shotgun.  Whistler slo raises his head, fixing Blade with a bloodshot eye.
How do you feel?
Like a fucking heifer took a dump in my mouth.

Whistler stands bare-chested before a corroded mirror, splashing water from a sink over his face, rinsing off shaving cream residue.  He inspects his features -- he's cleaned himself up a bit, trimmed his beard, etc. He pulls on a fresh shirt, then turns to face Blade, who stands behind him.
You came back for me.
Did you think I wouldn't?
Took you long enough.
Blade smiles.  That was as close to a thank-you as this o junkyard dog is ever going to give.
Whistler has fired up a Lucky Strike.  He's moving throug the storage area where much of his old equipment has been shelved, pulling tarps off, checking things.  Blade follo
Let's just hope you've kicked the Thirst for good.  I'll be watching you close. You start to back-slide --
You put a bullet in my brain.  Wouldn't expect anything else.
Whistler takes a long drag, expelling the smoke slowly, studying the cigarette in his hand.
I'll say one thing for doing time as a suckhead.  Seems to have knocked that cancer of mine back into remission.
Blade nods.  Then Whistler stops, obviously frustrated.
Where the hell's my lathe?
Just then we hear the SOUND of an industrial lathe firing Curious, Whistler exits into --

The workshop proper.  Scud is working at Whistler's old lathe, bopping his head along to MUSIC which is playing o nearby TV.  The them song to SPEED RACER.  Now he's weari Ron Jeremy T-shirt that says "Daddy".
Here he comes, here comes Speed Racer! He's a demon on wheels.  He's gaining on you so you better look alive.  He's busy revving up the powerful Mach Five --
Whistler cocks an incredulous eyebrow at Blade, who has fallen in beside him.  Scud kills the lathe and approache
Whistler.  Cool beans.  Nice to meet you, man.  Heard a lot.  I'm Josh Frohmeyer.  You can call me Scud, though.  That's what most people do.

Scud offers his hand.  Whistler doesn't take it.  Scud sh an uneasy glance at Blade, raising an eyebrow in question Is Whistler okay, or not?  Blade nods.  Whistler moves ov to the Charger which has its hood up.
Tell me something, Skid --
Scud.
Whatever -- (checking the motor) What'd you do to the Charger?
The pimp-mobile?  Just made a few after market modifications.  Nitrous-oxide injection system, forged aluminum pistons and crankshaft, higher flowing fuel pump.
Gave it a more aggressive exhaust profile ramping.
Fuck yeah.  Whole package'll crank this betty up another three-hundred horsepower.
(cutting him off) And you'll burn the damn thing out before your next fucking oil change.
Whistler just looks to Blade and shakes his head.
Where'd you dig up this shit-bird anyway?
Look, what's your problem?
Whistler gets in Scud's face.  Scud looks to Blade for he but he just watches, letting the two of them sort things

My problem, shitbird, is that I tried to blow my fucking head off and wound up sucking blood clots for the last year and a half!  Now you're standing there choking your chicken like we're all walking around some fucking candy-ass vampire sitcom!
Scud attempts to show some balls, but stammers all the sa
Hey, you think I don't know what's at stake here?  We practically compromised our whole operation to save your puckered old ass!  And for what?
(grabs Scud's shirt) Our operation?!  Our operation?!  I built this operation, you fucking turd stain.
Just then, however, an alarm starts BEEPING.  Scud checks display as Blade readies his MACH.
Motion sensors.  Looks like Zone Three.
Human?
Scud checks a series of thermal signature displays.
Body temp's fifty so I'll guess suck head.
Scud looks to a bank of security monitors -- the views br into static as a FIGURE rushes past them.  He tries a few keyboard commands.
I don't understand, I'm not getting anything on the surveillance cams.
Whistler makes a few adjustments on the nearest monitor.
They're fried.  Whoever's out there is using magnesium flares.  Seems like they've got your security system stopped out pretty well.
Whistler moves to a rack of weaponry.  As he reaches for 15, Scud moves to stop him.
Whoa, whoa, easy cowboy - I'm not trusting you with a weapon just yet.
Whistler SMACKS Scud in the face with the butt of the CAR and pushes past him.  We hear a CRASH.

head_text.subj: TWO BLACK, LATEX-CLAD, NINJA LIKE INTRUDERS

text: Running on all fours, racing upside down across the ceili at break-neck speed.  Then they drop, somersaulting down fifty feet, landing in a cat-like stance.
Hit the God-lights.
Scud, with his nose now bleeding, activates a series of stadium-style lights secured to the ceiling.  The entire place goes white with UV light, the image nearly blowing
They are wearing metal goggles with iris shut to mere pin prick openings. Whistler trains the CAR-15 on --

Who is now removing something from a satchel.  Whistler FIRES.  The Intruder drops the object and cartwheels away In the blink of an eye, the Second Intruder has launched himself at Whistler, hand-springing off the floor, then kicking him in the mid-section.  As Whistler falls back, Second Intruder presses forward.

Unsheathing his sword, rushing at the First Intruder. WHAP!  The Intruder traps Blade's forearm, pivoting, plan a boot in Blade's ribcage.  Obviously, the Intruder is a serious martial arts student. WHAP!WHAP!WHAP!  The two of them go at it, unleashing a flurry of kicks, blocks, and punches.  The Intruder gets Blade in a back-choke.  He twists out of it, throwing the Intruder over his shoulder, who neatly cartwheels, spring back off the wall at Blade again -- Blade ducks beneath one of the Intruder's kicks, then tra the Intruder's foot, giving it a savage twist.  CRACK!  B backhands the intruder with a blow so strong that it knoc the Intruder to his knees.  Then the Intruder reaches for short sword.  In a heartbeat, the sword is out and agains Blade's throat.  Just as Blade's sword is not against the Intruder's.  It's a stalemate.
Stop!!!!!
Blade and the First Intruder freeze.  The Second Intruder steps away from Whistler, whom he clearly had the drop on and tosses the CAR-15 to the ground.
We didn't come here to fight.  We came to deliver a message.

Blade looks back to the First Intruder.  Then slowly withdraws his sword.  The Intruder does the same.  Blade turns off the God-lights.  The UVs fade and normal lighti returns.  Scud and Whistler pick themselves up off the fl
Take off your masks.

The Intruders remove their masks.  The first is ASAD, a cautious Sufi Muslim possessing a restrained nobility. The second is a woman, NYSSA.  20-something, with emerald eyes and strong, darkly exotic features.  Both are Vampir
My name is Asad.  This is Nyssa.  We represent the Shadow Cabinet.  The ruling body of Vampire nation.  They're offering you a truce.  They want to meet with you.
(wiping blood from his nose) Bullshit.

Blade holds up his hand, silencing Scud's outburst.  He n for Nyssa and Asad to continue. Nyssa slowly crouches and reaches for the object she drop - a CD.  She tosses it to Blade.  Still keeping an eye on them, Blade slips the CD into a reader.  We SEE a slide-s of video capture shots taken from a surveillance camera. Nomak tearing into the blood bank staff, etc.
For decades you've been the thing we've feared the most.  But there's something else loose on the streets now --
The final still.  A blurry, horrific shot of Nomak's half turned face and back.  We get a sense of distorted, inhum physiognomy.
Something worse than you.
Blade, Whistler, and Scud stand near the ledge, while Asa stands a few yards off, talking on a phone.  Nyssa stands even further away, watching them with distrust.
This whole deal's giving me a serious case of the butt-willies.
Look, kid, they obviously found your base of operations.  If it was a trap, why flip their dicks by announcing themselves?
I agree.  We play along for now, we might wind up learning something about how their world ticks.
(grinning at Scud) Either that or feeding the worms.
Asad finishes his call and approaches them.
They're ready to see you now.
As if on cue, we hear the THRUM of helicopters.  Seconds later, two Bell Jet Rangers appear above them, illuminati them in their searchlight.
We track the helicopters across the night sky.  We SEE Whistler and Asad in one, Blade, Scud and Nyssa in anothe
Blade and Nyssa sit in the rear of the first helicopter. Nyssa is studying Blade.
What?

They tell bedtime stories about you. Blade the big, bad boogie-man.  Frankly, I'm disappointed. (Blade raises an eyebrow) That you were willing to come along so easily, I mean.  Without any assurances.
Blade smiles and opens his coat, gesturing to a bandolier plastic explosives secured to his chest.
Semtex explosive.  Enough to level a city block.  How's that for assurance?
The helicopter abruptly banks right, dropping down low.

The Bell Jet Rangers touch down outside a terraced, Frank Lloyd Wright structure overlooking the ocean.  As Nyssa a Asad lead Blade, Whistler and Scud towards the facility w SEE a circular crimson logo encircling a double-helix. Scud notices a series of RED LIGHT DOTS on his arms and chest.  He looks up to see DOZENS OF VAMPIRE MARKSMEN on roofs above, training their weapons on them.
The group rides down.  The elevator stops.  The doors ope
Nyssa and Asad lead them into a hub out of which multiple corridors project.  They take the central corridor.

The corridor ends at a pair of steel security doors.  Nys stands before a biometric scanner, allowing a beam of lig to play over her face.  The scanner acknowledges her iden and the doors HISS open, revealing a series of security d beyond these which successively open into --
Oak, set into a stainless steel wall.  Incalculably ancie elaborately carved.  Brought over from the "Old World."
The House of Erebus you encountered before were nothing but feudal lords. The true power of the Vampire Nation lies here --
As they move towards the final door, Whistler shivers.  S watches as his breath escapes from his mouth in a frosty plume.  Asad takes notice.
Few warmbloods have seen what's beyond this door.
He pushes the doors open into --

A crescent-shaped room filled with antiquities: quarry columns from Middle Kingdom Egypt, stacks of arcane volum Medieval frontispieces.  A Borgia-esque Renaissance portr staring down at us with a severe gaze.  Towering over all these is a massive Greek Cross carved from stone.  MUSIC echoes around them -- Boito's Faust.  Standing in the mid of this is OVERLORD ELI DAMASKINOS, wearing a robe of bla silk.
Father --
Damaskinos holds up his hand.  He waits for the music to crescendo, then turns, his face still hidden in shadow.
I hope you don't mind the cold.  When one such as myself reaches an advanced age, certain precautions are needed in order to preserve the flesh.
Blade, this is Overlord Eli Damaskinos.
(in vampire dialect; subtitled) Welcome, Daywalker.  I thank you for coming.  I've been anxious to meet you for quite some time.

Damaskinos draws closer now, stepping into the light.  Br eyed with smile like moonlight gleaming off a knife blade His skin is impossibly pale, almost marble-like, with traceries of blue blood pulsing underneath.
And the late Abraham Whistler.  I trust your time amongst our numbers was agreeable?
Whistler glares at Damaskinos.  The two men stare at each other a moment, sizing one another up.

(smiling knowingly) It has been said, you may have enemies whom you hate, but not enemies whom you despise.  Be proud of your enemy: then his success shall be yours, too.  In that regard, I should thank you.
For what?
Eliminating Deacon Frost.
CARTER STEVENS, an officious-looking familiar who has bee quietly watching from the wings now steps forward.
All that unseemly business with LaMagra. You did us a favor. (offering his hand to Blade) Carter Stevens.
As Blade and Stevens shake, Blade notices a vampire glyph poking out from beneath the familiar's shirt cuff.
You're human.
(with a smile) Barely.  I'm a lawyer.
Mr. Stevens works with the National Institute of Health. (off Blade's look) Given that they monitor the nation's blood supply, a strategic alliance seemed prudent.
We also finance a number of humanitarian organizations -- the National Institute of Infectious Diseases for one, the Human Genome Project...
Why?
Survival.

Blade and the others turn to Nyssa, who uses a complex mechanical key to activate a holo-projector mounted above table.  As she focuses the image, a 3-D DIORAMA of vampir viral nucleocapsids swirls into view.  The nucelocapsids begin attacking human red blood cells.

As you may know, Vampirism is an arbovirus, one that's spread through the saliva of parasitic organisms -- (motioning to the hologram) In this case, vampires are the vector. The virus replicates within the human bloodstream, evolving its host into an entirely new life-form. (beat) Unfortunately, viruses evolve too --

As Nyssa talks, one of the viral nucleocapsids changes, mutating from its original, elegant design into a harsher more menacing form. The mutated nucleocapsid begins feeding on the original vampire capsids, causing a chain-reaction of mutation.  I seconds, the holo-image is filled with throbbing, microsc horrors which then mutate into  --
We've dubbed this new virus the Reaper Strain.  And like any good pathogen, it appears to have found a carrier -- a "Patient Zero".
A rotating 3-D image of Jared Nomak's face.  Eyes red, hi skin in full "blood mode" blush.
His name is Jared Nomak.

Thiavolos, as we used to say in Greece. The Devil.  Pure Thirst.  Nothing more. He was born a vampire, but he is an anomaly. (to Blade) Like you.  Unlike the rest of us, however, he feeds on not just humans, but vampires as well.
Seems like he's doing me a favor, then.

You're missing the point.  Their vampire victims don't die.  They turn.  They become carriers.  If the Reapers continue unchecked, there could be thousands of them before the month is over.  Do the math.
Blade turns to Damaskinos.
(vampire dialect; subtitled) You want me to hunt them for you.
(vampire dialect; subtitled) Not alone.
We've been training a small tactical unit -- the Bloodpack.  We want you to lead them.
Just how long has this little social club of yours been together?
Two years.
Then they weren't created to go after your "patient zero".
No.  They've been training to hunt you.
Blade, Whistler and Scud enter through the loading elevat Blade turns to Whistler.
What do you think?
Sounds like a plan.
What do you really think?
(lighting a cigarette) These guys are shitting bricks cause they're no longer on the top of the food chain.  They're going to fuck us the first chance they get.
Whistler moves away.  Blade shrugs off his jacket, begins putting away his weapons.  Scud lingers, apprehensive.
So you're going to do this?
Keep your friends close and your enemies closer.  Isn't that how the saying goes?

Scud follows Blade's gaze, watching Whistler, who has collapsed into a chair at the far end of the workshop.  T grizzled hunter pulls off his leg brace, then massages hi bum knee.  Scud nods in Whistler's direction.
I'm worried about him. (off Blade's look) Look, I know he's your friend, but just watch him, okay?  Nobody goes cold Turkey from the Thirst in a night.

Surrounded by the salvaged parts and massive gears of lon discarded machinery, half-hidden in shadow.  A shaft of morning sunlight cuts in through one of the windows, slow moving across the floor towards his position.  He shifts his chair, moving slightly -- Away from the light.

It's late.  An ice-encased streetlight HUMS and flickers. The pumps are vacant.  A heavy blanket of sooty snow cove the grounds of the station.  The fluorescents of the mini mart are the only beacon of light in an otherwise fog-bou night.

A KOREAN WOMAN (30s) mans the counter.  Her TODDLER sits circular safety walker nearby.  The kind that rolls and i affixed with toys to keep a baby occupied.  The woman gla at two surveillance monitors.  On the first monitor we se
pull up to the pumps outside.  A MAN gets out, slides his credit card through the reader, starts pumping gas.

We SEE a FIGURE standing at the back by the Slurpee machi The figure turns, approaching.  It's Nomak.  He sets a package of gum on the counter, looks to the baby.  He smi wriggles his finger.  The child COOS and smiles back. Unnerved by Nomak, the Korean woman quickly rings the transaction, gives him his change.  He removes a stick of from the pack, carefully unwraps it, slides it into his mouth, watching the child all the while.  Finally, he nod the woman and leaves.  The door CHIMES as he exits. Beat.  The woman looks to the surveillance monitors again
The car is still there, but the man pumping gas is gone. Puzzled, the woman steps from behind the counter and move the glass doors, looking out --
The car's driver side door hangs open.  Even more disturb the hose for the gas pump lies untended on the icy ground spilling fuel from its nozzle.

The Korean woman cautiously exits the mini-mart.  No one in sight.  She hurries to the abandoned car, disengaging lock on the pump handle, then setting it back in its crad She looks to the open driver's door.  A FEW DROPLETS OF B have stained the snow just outside it.  Then she sees --

Standing off in the fog-bound shadows.  The woman looks b to the mini-mart, then back again to where the figure was standing.  But the figure is gone!  Growing increasingly anxious, the woman hurries back.

The woman shuts the door, locks it.  But she's still just target standing inside a well-lit glass box.  She moves t the safety walker, scoops up her child. After another moment's indecision, she slides the accordi style gate down over the doors and windows.  Then she tur off the lights.  Feeling somewhat more secure, the woman moves back around the counter and SEES -- An unwrapped stick of gum resting on the tray of the baby walker.  It wasn't there before.  With a rising sense of dread, the woman backs away, bumping right into --

He smiles cruelly, the scar/seam in his chin just beginni to part.  The woman gasps, turns to run -- and bumps into THREE MORE REAPERS.  Gaunt and feral-looki All three with shaved heads. No eyebrows, and hairline scar/seams running down their chins.  As one, the reapers descend on her.  We hear the child's TERRIFIED WAIL and we --
A sulfur-colored moon shines its baleful light down upon icy cityscape as NOMAK'S ROAR echoes through the canyon o buildings.

Blade is just finishing injecting himself with serum.  He sighs, falling back into the chair he's sitting in, waiti for the shakes to subside.  He unwraps a piece of rubbing tubing which he'd been using as a tourniquet, flexes his hand. The door to his room opens.  Scud stands there in silhoue
Um, we've got company.
Blade emerges into the workshop proper with Whistler and Scud.

Stand before us.  They represent an assortment of ages an races, their one unifying characteristic being a callous, almost fanatical disregard for human life.  In short, the guys are the most stone-cold motherfuckers we've ever see
Well if it isn't Snow White and the Seven Suckheads.

Their leader, DIETER REINHARDT (30s), is a square-jawed, chiseled Austrian.  Next to Reinhardt is SNOWMAN, a wire albino, LIGHTHAMMER, a massive Blackfoot Indian, and PRIE a bald-headed modern primitive with copious piercings and facial tattoos.  Rounding out the bunch is CHUPA, a blunt featured Puerto Rican, and VERLAINE, a familiar-looking curvaceous beauty with bee-stung lips that exudes a preda sexuality. (NOTE: Verlaine looks familiar because she is the twin si of Raquel, the bodacious vamp played by Traci Lords that Blade killed in the opening scene of the first film.)
Check it out, troops.  Count Chocula.
The vampires LAUGH.  Asad quiets them with a look, then gestures to them in turn.
Blade, this is Reinhardt.  That's Snowman, Lighthammer, Priest, Chupa and Verlaine.
Reinhardt advances until he and Blade are nose to nose.
Tell me something, Chief.  Can you blush?
A tense beat.  Then Blade flashes a broad smile.
Alright, you want to play this game?
Blade pulls out one of his silver stakes.  In response, t vampires reach for their weapons.  But Blade merely twirl around his fingers.  Then tosses it to Reinhardt.
You've been training two years to take me out.  Here I am, the big, bad vampire hunter.  So do it.
What the hell are you doing, Blade?
We're going to be working as a unit, you people will be taking orders from me. (spreading his hands wide) So let's get it over with.  I'll give you a free shot, Reinhardt.
Reinhardt looks to Nyssa, uncomfortable.
Why are you looking at her for?  You need permission?   I'm giving it to you.
Take him, cabron!
Blade grabs Reinhardt's wrist, pulling the stake against chest, fixing the vampire with the deadliest of poker gaz
What's wrong, Reinhardt?  You need a fucking manual?
Do it, Reinhardt.  Do it!!!

Reinhardt tenses, thrusting the stake forward -- but Blad has already whirled out of the way, trapping his hand, th violently twisting it backwards. Before Reinhardt even knows what's happening, Blade swing him around into a headlock.  In his free hand he's got a tiny, barbed flechette.  The barbs spring open like a tic gripping mandibles as Blade drives the flechette into the base of Reinhardt's skull.  Reinhardt HOWLS in pain, but Blade just tightens his grip, choking off Reinhardt's air

Listen up, Adolph, I just popped an explosive charge in the back of your head.  Silver nitrate.  Rigged to blow if anyone tampers with it.  I'll be keeping the detonator on me at all times.  You so much as look at me crosswise and I swear you'll be macking your girlfriend's pie with a fucking neck stump!  Got it?!
Reinhardt lets loose a choked GRUNT.  Blade releases him, dropping the GASPING AUSTRIAN to the floor.
Any questions?
No one says a word.
Hefting a heavy ordnance case on the table.  Blade and company sit on one side, the Bloodpack on the other.

(opening a case of bullets) Glaser safety rounds in .38, .45, and 9mm caliber.  Foil capsules at the tip filled with silver nitrate grains.  They pack a major kinetic energy dump.  And since you suckheads don't like sunlight, we've modified the entry lights with UV filters --

Whistler flicks on the entry light.  Then notices that Ch isn't paying attention.  The vampire is looking at Snowma who is saying something in sign-language.  Chupa snickers Whistler picks up a massive gun with a modified C-mag (hundred round cylindrical mag).  It has a strange electr assembly barrel with shockwave ports running along it.
This puppy here?  Hyper-velocity railgun.  Spits up silver-tipped iron core needles at six thousand butt humping feet per second.  Like this --

Whistler FIRES -- BA-BANG!  A SONIC BOOM rocks the worksh SHATTERING a number of windows and computer monitor scree as a wad of needle rushes just millimeters past Chupa's f embedding in the wall behind him.
Hey, hey!  The fuck you doing?!
Getting your attention, Paco.
Well you've got it, warmblood.  Now what the fuck are you gonna do with it?
Blade clears his throat and stands.
If you girls are finished flirting, I'd like to get started.

Blade, Whistler, and the Bloodpack are silently suiting u for war -- strapping on body armor, securing stakes and knives, CLICKING ammo cartridges into their various weapo We SEE them lacing up combat boots, checking rifle sights entry lights.  Blade dons one of his EDTA pneumatic gauntlets.  Whistler loads custom rounds into a shotgun. Then he reaches to clip on an ammo vest.  But his hands a shaking slightly and he can't seem to clip the locking mechanism together.  After a beat, Blade reaches over and does it for Whistler.  Like a son helping his father.  A passes between them, Whistler and Blade looking at one another.  Then Whistler nods, satisfied. As Blade crosses towards Asad and Nyssa, he stops by Verlaine, sizing her up.
Didn't I kill you already?
(cold) That was my sister.
Beat.  Blade smiles coldly.
This the part where you beat your chest and vow revenge?
Something like that.
Save it for the director's cut.
Blade moves on, stopping before Nyssa.
Where to first?
The House of Pain.
Blade, Whistler, and the Bloodpack are gathered on a roof overlooking a derelict city block.
Rises before them, a Gothic Revival hotel marred by graff scrawls and boarded up windows.  There's a large neon "HO sign on the side of the building.
From what we can gather, the Reapers hunt in packs, targeting places where vampires congregate.  So far, they've attacked bloodbanks, safehouses, underground clubs like this --
I don't see any traffic, no vampire glyphs --
Whistler lifts up a pair of night-vision binoculars and s the building.
He scans the graffiti scrawls, doesn't see anything.
Look closer.  Because of your efforts, we've had to re-think our habits, tighten our security.

Whistler switches to infra-red.  A previously unseen Vamp GLYPH is now revealed, hidden amongst the haphazard graff Just beneath the glyph are a pair of loading doors set fl into the concrete sidewalk.
(lowering binocs; to Blade) Let's put this clusterfuck in gear.
Reinhardt reaches for Whistler, stopping him.
You're not going anywhere, greenjeans. You won't be able to pass for us.
Like I give a shit.
Before things can escalate, Blade steps between them.
(to Whistler; sotto) He's right.  They'll smell that you're human.  Stay here, watch our backs.
(bristling) I don't like it.
I'm not giving you a choice, old man.
Whistler considers Blade's words, then reluctantly nods. Blade rejoins the vampires.  Reinhardt grins.
You don't keep that dog of yours curbed, Blade.  We might have to do it for you.
Blade pulls out the remote for the flechette in Reinhardt head, holding it up for view.
Keep pushing, asshole.

Nyssa leads the group into a loading area.  The only ligh coming from a series of burning trashcans.  VAMPIRE SENTR crouch on the steps, watching, smelling Nyssa's group as move past.  Adjacent areas are walled off with sheets of vinyl.  We hear the pulsing, bass-heavy beat of MUSIC com from beyond the sheeting, beckoning us onward.

The MUSIC is louder.  Neon-lit, corridor-long steel count line both walls, displaying various surgical instruments offered as party favors.  As Blade's scans the area, we S the deadly instruments reflected in his sunglasses.  Nyss looks to him.
This is our world you're entering.  You may see things -- feeding. (off Blade's inscrutable face) Just remember why you're here.
(cryptic) I haven't forgotten.
They reach a steel loading door emblazoned with warning s -- the kind that is split horizontally, one-half retracti into the ceiling, the other into the floor.
So what are we looking for, exactly?
Anyone who looks suspicious.
On that portentous note, Nyssa hits a button.  The hydrau doors open on into --
You gotta be kidding me.

A high-ceilinged ballroom packed with SWAYING BODIES. Retrofitted into a trance-dance hall.  Off to the sides, people are being pierced, tattooed, ritually scarred.  Si trays piled high with razor blades are passed through the writhing crowd.  Everyone looks suspicious.

is under way.  Joel Peter Witkin channeled by Julie Taymo A SHE-VAMPIRE hangs from the ceiling, her body supported steel pins which have been hooked through her flesh.  THR PVC-clad spindly FIGURES minister to her.
French kiss, exchanging razor blades with their tongues.
(to Nyssa) What is it with you people and pain?

We need it.  Sensations are addictive and pain cuts the deepest. (off his look) Tattoos, piercings, tribal scarring -- because we regenerate, none of it's permanent.  So we have to take it to the next level. To remind us we're alive.
The Bloodpack fans out through the trancing crowd.

Drifting through the press of flesh.  Feral faces flash b us, distorted by the stroboscopic lights.  A SHE-VAMPIRE latches onto him.  He shoves her aside, keeps scanning fa It takes every ounce of his restraint not to cut loose.
You reading me, Scud?
A nondescript van with primer blotches is parked nearby.
Loud and clear, B.

The interior of the van has been outfitted into a mobile center".  Scud sits in a cluttered nest of electronic ephermera, munching on a bag of White Castle hamburgers. He's watching a video feed from a camera mounted on Blade gear, listening to the Bloodpack's CHATTER coming in from various audio channels.  In the background, he's also got Barry White's "Love Machine" playing.
Everything's copacetic in the Mystery Van.  How you doing, Whistler?
Whistler is atop the roof of a nearby building, outfitted with a sniper rifle on a tripod.
Walking on sunshine, toke-boy.

The view pans from the hotel entrance to Scud's van. Whistler puts down the binoculars, lights a cigarette.  H takes out a knife and slices open his palm.  He stares at blood, his hand slowly trembling.

Blade works his way through the crowd.  The beat is getti heavier now, the crowd more energized.  He briefly makes contact with Nyssa, but then she's gone again, disappeari into the sea of flesh, ducking past one of the vinyl shee into a corridor beyond.  Chupa, Asad, Snowman and Priest remain behind, searching the crowd. As Blade walks, he notices a series of grates beneath the feet.  We shift our POV --

-- and we are below Blade, looking up at him through the grate.  We are in a blood-encrusted drainage area just beneath the ballroom that slopes inward towards a large, octagonal iron culvert.  As we watch, a section of the culvert rises, a pair of RED EYES peering out from the darkness within.
Blade follows Nyssa up a narrow staircase into a corridor lined with gangrenous, peeling wallpaper.  Some of the ro doors are shut, some open.  Clearly, many are occupied.

A 1930s industrial kitchen filled with corroded equipment Reinhardt, Verlaine, and Lighthammer work their way inwar searching the area.  Lighthammer carries massive war hamm like his namesake. Reinhardt nods to Verlaine, who opens a walk-in, shining entry light over an assortment of rusting meat hooks.

Blade checks more doorways, catching half-glimpses of FLE LEATHER, and STEEL.  He hears SOBBING, MOANS, WHISPERS. Then, a distinctly HUMAN WHIMPER catches his attention. Nyssa opens a door onto an empty room.  A vacant stainles steel examination table gleams in the center, waiting. Blade pushes open another door.  We SEE a fearful YOUNG W crouching in the corner of a soiled room.  A corpulent VAMPIRE in a leather apron is hosing down the floor.
Close the fucking door, buddy.
Blade makes eye-contact with the woman.  She's clearly hu Blade tenses.  The corpulent vampire is getting irate whe
I said, close the f--
THUNK!  Blade throws a sliver stake into the vampire's forehead.  Even as the vampire turns to ash, Blade motion for the girl to leave and we're out the hallway again, Ny turning around.
What was that?
(poker-faced) Nothing.
We SEE the woman duck out the room behind him.

Reinhardt, Verlaine, and Lighthammer.  A Styrofoam cup ro across the floor, blown by a breeze.  Reinhardt pauses, notices another walk-in freezer door ajar, moves in that direction. Unseen behind them, a door BEHIND THEM slowly swings open

Chupa, Asad, Snowman and Priest.  THREE SHADOWED FIGURES lurking near one of the exits -- skinhead types, each wit hairline scar running down their chin. Asad silently motions to snowman and the others, indicati figures.  Snowman signs something back.  The vampire trio starts towards them.

Bored to shit, Scud plucks a joint from behind his ear. he fires up his woman torso lighter we HEAR SOMETHING jus outside the van.  Scud kills the Barry White, listening. Silence.  Then, a FAINT SKITTERING.
Um, Whistler, you out there?
No response.
(more urgently) Whistler?

Still no response.  Scud reaches for a handgun and creeps into the front of the van.  He looks out the windshield - nothing.  He looks left, then right - nothing. Unnerved, Scud returns to the back of the van.  He reache for the handle of the rear door and abruptly jerks the do open, aiming the gun out -- There's nothing outside the van.  But then Scud hears the SKITTERING AGAIN.  His eyes shift apprehensively to the f of the van below him.

As they near the end of the hall, Blade notices a drop-do attic door in the ceiling above.  He unsheathes his sword uses the tip to unlatch the trapdoor.  The counter-weight door CREAKS and LOWERS, unfolding a sectioned ladder.  We darkness beyond.  As Blade cautiously mounts the stairs - Nyssa's attention is drawn to a billowing piece of vinyl. BLURRY FIGURE is visible behind it.  Then it moves away. Nyssa ducks past the vinyl.

As the music reaches a crescendo, Asad notices MORE SHADO FIGURES by another exit.  And even MORE by a third.  Snow signs to Asad again, more urgently this time, as the firs potential Reaper begins to turn and we are --
-- back with Scud.  He ducks his head outside, looking beneath the van.  Nothing there.  Relieved, Scud shuts th rear door, laughs to himself.
Suddenly rip down through the ceiling of the van, peeling up and back like it was tinfoil!  A REAPER with a bloody bandage covering his eye SNARLS down at us.

The first skinhead figure spins towards us.  It's a Reape All three of them are, eyes wide with bloodlust as they l at Asad and the others. Suddenly, the Reapers are everywhere, blocking the exits, ripping into their vampire victims, tossing them aside li toys.  Vampires scream and run, some taking to the walls means of escape, some racing across the ceiling.

Blade stops half-way up the ladder as he hears GUNFIRE. drops back to the floor, then notices that Nyssa is gone. pushes through the vinyl curtain and finds -- Nyssa force back against the wall, wrestling with --
(filtered; panicked) They're here!!!!

-- Nomak, who swings his head around towards Blade!  Blad FIRES his MACH pistol point-blank into Nomak's face, blas the Reaper backwards -- But Nomak is back on his feet in a split-second, SMASHING through a window onto the fire escape beyond.  Blade rush to the window, looks out --
Nomak is scaling his way straight up the neon hotel sign, jumping from one letter to the next with lightning speed.

A Reaper EXPLODES out from the walk-in, rather than the d behind them.  He leaps atop Reinhardt, SLAMMING him to th floor.  Lighthammer swings his hammer, missing the Reaper taking out a chunk of the wall instead. Lighthammer swings and misses again, taking a chunk out o the floor.  Verlaine empties her automatic rifle into the Reaper even as -- The Reaper turns on Lighthammer, catching the war hammer, Reaper's lower jaw disengages and splits open, revealing freakishly enlarged esophagus lined with serrated, sharkl teeth. All of this takes a split-second.  No time for Lighthamme react as the Reaper latches its grossly expanded mouth on his throat and begins draining him before our eyes.  The Reaper SHUDDERS and the whites of his eyes bleed red as a ecstatic wave washes over him.  His pale flesh, pulsing w engorged veinwork, becomes flushed, turning crimson as --
Ohmygodhe'sfuckingkillingmehe's --
Lighthammer's face becomes increasingly pallid!  His face begins caving inward, shrinking as every millimeter of bl is vacuumed out of him.

Are popping up beneath the Reaper's briefly translucent s becoming engorged and dilated.  The veins continue to swe racing up his neck, then branching out over his face, che and arms -- like an instant network of varicose veins. Verlaine retreats, horrified.  Reinhardt scurries backwar then scrambles to his feet, running for his life into --
Chaos.  Vampire patrons flee.  The Bloodpack FIRE, unleas a hailstorm of bullets, cutting into vampires and Reapers alike as --

Blade steps out onto the icy fire escape.  CRASH!  Nomak dislodged the "H" from the hotel sign.  It comes HURTLING towards Blade, who ducks back into the center of the "O" avoid being hit.  The "H" continues falling, SMASHING dow into the street near the Mystery Van where --

Scud unloads his handgun into the Reaper atop the van.  T Reaper should turn to ash, but it doesn't!  Scud flees, DIVING into the front of the van, ducking behind the whee He keys the ignition -- WHAM!  Now the Reaper is atop the hood, SMASHING his feet through the windshield.  Scud SCREAMS as he slams the van into the drive and floors the pedal -- WK-KRUNCH!  Scud CRASHES the van against the side of a building, pinning the Reaper between the van's front bump and the crumbling wall.  He keeps his foot on the gas ped GRINDING the van's wheels. This gambit should cut the Reaper in half, or at the very least, fatally wound it -- but it only enrages it further The Reaper stretches forward across the van's crumpled ho and resumes BATTERING away at the cracked windshield --
UV headlights, c'mon, come on!!!
Scud fumbles for the headlights.  They won't go on!  Then notices a mess of wiring haphazardly duct-taped together. reaches for the wiring, fiddling with it --
FuckmefuckmefuckmeFUCKME!!!!

The Reaper nearest Priest turns in his direction.  We recognize her as the Nurse from the bloodbank.  She LEAPS Priest -- Priest fires a Glaser round through the she-Reaper's head The Reaper twists in mid-leap, falls to the floor, then p herself up again.  Like Scud's Reaper, she seems unaffect by the custom-made ammo.

head_text.subj: ON THE OTHER MEMBERS OF THE BLOODPACK

text: Having similarly disastrous results.  The Reapers are shrugging off their firepower.  Asad leaps, snapping a Reaper's neck with a spinning heel kick, but the Reaper k coming!

Alarmed, reaching for a specialized shotgun instead.  The Reaper continues forward, moving so fast she almost seems blur as BA-BOOM! BA-BOOM!  Priest pumps his shotgun repeatedly.  Two projectiles fire out, chained together b length of titanium cable.  The cable catches the Reaper i the mid-section, cutting it clean in half! The upper half of the Reaper falls, then rights itself, landing on its clawed hands. Impossibly, the she-Reaper keeps coming!  She skitters towards Priest on his hands like the half-man from Todd Browning's "FREAKS". The half-Reaper launches itself at Priest, hitting him in chest, knocking him back to the floor.  Priest panics as struggles with the thing, trying to fend off its claws an fangs as it locks its mouth into his arm.  He SCREAMS.

As Scud continues to fiddle with the faulty headlight wir the windshield finally SHATTERS beneath the Reaper's poun fists.  It latches onto Scud's collar and pulls him forwa over the wheel even as the seam/scar in its chin splits a and the Reaper's enlarged maw flowers open.  Scud is just centimeters away from having his face being bitten off wh -- the wires SPARK and the headlights come on, illuminati the Reaper in a wash of UV light!  The effect is instantaneous.  The Reaper HOWLS and lets go, then prompt BURSTS INTO FLAMES. Scud cups his ear, shouting via the comm system.
Use your entry lights!  They can't stand the UV!!!

Asad hears Scud's message as he continues fending off a Reaper's attack.  Then he manages to get hold of his rifl He FLICKS on the UV entry light, aiming it at the Reaper' face.  The Reaper's head catches fire.  Asad SHOUTS to th others --
Use your entry lights!
One by one, the members of the Bloodpack CLICK ON the ent lights mounted atop their guns.  It's working -- the UV b are the only thing that seems to be driving the Reapers b
BOOM!  Blade kicks open the roof access door.  He hurries outside, followed by Nyssa, who hesitates when she SEES -
